verses.name: Hebrews 6:6
verses.text: If they shall fall away, to renew them again unto repentance; seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh, and put him to an open shame.

verses.name: Hebrews 6:7
verses.text: For the earth which drinketh in the rain that cometh oft upon it, and bringeth forth herbs meet for them by whom it is dressed, receiveth blessing from God:

verses.name: Hebrews 6:8
verses.text: But that which beareth thorns and briers is rejected, and is nigh unto cursing; whose end is to be burned.

verses.name: Hebrews 6:9
verses.text: But, beloved, we are persuaded better things of you, and things that accompany salvation, though we thus speak.
